description: [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) uses a command-line interface to interact with systems.(Citation: Cobalt Strike TTPs Dec 2017)(Citation: Talos Cobalt Strike September 2020)(Citation: Cobalt Strike Manual 4.3 November 2020)

external_references.description: Cobalt Strike. (2017, December 8). Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures. Retrieved December 20, 2017.
Mavis, N. (2020, September 21). The Art and Science of Detecting Cobalt Strike. Retrieved April 6, 2021.
